title: Genesis Chapter 40 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 40 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: According to Genesis 40:2, who was wroth against two of his officers?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:2 states: "And Pharaoh was wroth against two of his officers, against the chief of the butlers, and against the chief of the bak..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 40:6, who came in unto them in the morning?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:6 states: "And Joseph came in unto them in the morning, and looked upon them, and, behold, they were sad."

questions.question: According to Genesis 40:8, who said unto them?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:8 states: "And they said unto him, We have dreamed a dream, and there is no interpreter of it. And Joseph said unto them, Do not..."

questions.question: Who said "unto him, We have dreamed a dream, and there is no interpreter of it" in Genesis 40:8?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:8 states: "And they said unto him, We have dreamed a dream, and there is no interpreter of it. And Joseph said unto them, Do not..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 40:12, who said unto him?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:12 states: "And Joseph said unto him, This is the interpretation of it: The three branches are three days:"

questions.question: Who said "unto him, This is the interpretation of it: The three branches are three days:" in Genesis 40:12?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:12 states: "And Joseph said unto him, This is the interpretation of it: The three branches are three days:"

questions.question: Who said "This is the interpretation thereof: The three baskets are three days:" in Genesis 40:18?
questions.explanation: Genesis 40:18 states: "And Joseph answered and said, This is the interpretation thereof: The three baskets are three days:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 40:3: "And he put them in ward in the house of the captain of the guard, into the prison , the place where ______ was bound."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he put them in ward in the house of the captain of the guard, into the prison , the place where Joseph was bound."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 40:4: "And the captain of the guard charged ______ with them, and he served them: and they continued a season in ward."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the captain of the guard charged Joseph with them, and he served them: and they continued a season in ward."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 40:7: "And he asked ______'s officers that were with him in the ward of his lord's house, saying, Wherefore look ye so sadly to day?"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he asked Pharaoh's officers that were with him in the ward of his lord's house, saying, Wherefore look ye so sadl..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 40:9: "And the chief butler told his dream to ______, and said to him, In my dream, behold, a vine was before me;"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the chief butler told his dream to Joseph, and said to him, In my dream, behold, a vine was before me;"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 40:10: "And in the ______ were three branches: and it was as though it budded, and her blossoms shot forth; and the clusters thereof brought forth ripe gra..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And in the vine were three branches: and it was as though it budded, and her blossoms shot forth; and the clusters th..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 40:11: "And ______'s cup was in my hand: and I took the grapes, and pressed them into ______'s cup, and I gave the cup into ______'s hand."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Pharaoh's cup was in my hand: and I took the grapes, and pressed them into Pharaoh's cup, and I gave the cup into..."
